subject: Re: [junit] Re: NoSuchMethodError ?
msgSnippet: ... What do you have in the method com.test.testapp.main()? Why are you naming a class with a lowercase letter? -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
zetaray@... wrote:

> thanks. that was a typo I have for this post.
>
> Anyhow, I fingered a way to get around it.
> If I use
> >java junit.textui.TestRunner com.test.testapp
>
> the juinit test will run fine; but I can't just use
> >java com.test.testapp

What do you have in the method com.test.testapp.main()? Why are you
naming a class with a lowercase letter?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
